contents.name: README
contents.contents: My name is Mark Randhawa. I recently completed a 12 week web development bootcamp and I'm now looking for a junior developer role. You can contact me at mark.randhawa@gmail.com or follow me on Twitter @markrandhawa.

contents.name: samp.lr
contents.description: A keyboard drum machine, allowing you to create your own songs using the samples provided.

contents.name: cheerups
contents.description: Allows users to create and share 'cheerups' â€“ happy little quips to brighten other peoples' days, which are limited to 141 characters.

contents.name: Blog
contents.description: During my web development course, I created a blog which I updated weekly. It charts my progress and the topics covered.

contents.description: Small JS library for creating particle systems with HTML canvas.
